TextBody:
Hello Karthik,

Thank you for your time in today's session. 

In the meeting we have created a test policy to monitor the file transfers, for which we have created a CAP alert. 

We have made multiple tests, but none of the successful. Please check if the email settings are setup correctly and try to send a test email. 
In this way we can verify if the alerts are being received or not. 

I have also scheduled a new session for tomorrow at 12:30 IST and sent you the meeting details in a separate email.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

On Fri, 21 Jun 2024, 7:08 pm Netwrix Support, <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Karthik,

Thank you for getting back to us. 

Can you please let us know if you receive any test email after you setup the email settings from the EPP web console ? 

If not, can you verify if the setup is correct ? 

If yes, we can schedule a short session next week at. 13:30 IST.  Should the timeframe does not suit you please provide us 2 3 slots with your availability for the next week.

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
